硯山.definition: Yanshan county in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao autonomous prefecture 文山壯族苗族自治州|文山壮族苗族自治州[Wen2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

硯山縣.definition: Yanshan county in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao autonomous prefecture 文山壯族苗族自治州|文山壮族苗族自治州[Wen2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

硯席.definition: ink slab and sitting mat; place where one studies and teaches

硯水壺兒.definition: water container for an ink slab

硯滴.definition: small cup for adding water to an ink stone

硯田.definition: ink stone; writing as a livelihood

硯田之食.definition: to make a living by writing (idiom)

硯盒.definition: case for an ink stone or ink slab
